group_1.textRight: *Sigh* ...Kids these days...

group_1.textLeft: Um...uh...@What did you want to tell me...?

group_1.textRight: I, I don't know, but this guy looks angry...
He also called out to Mikage, but...
...you looked like you were deep in thought...?

group_1.textLeft: So that's what happened...@Sorry.
Um...what did you need with us...?

group_1.textRight: Like I said before, your ol' pal here's part of the@neighborhood watch.
So it's my job to talk to any kids who look like@they're up to no good.
Like you two, for instance.

group_1.textLeft: W-we're not "up to" anything!

group_1.textRight: Were you not hiding and spying on the candy store@earlier?
That sort of thing tends to look suspicious, you know.
Especially you...@aren't you a Daito Academy girl?
You ought to look out for that sort of thing;@people might get the wrong idea.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: A while ago a child from Daito shoplifted from this@store.
Things like that haven't happened lately, but...

group_1.textLeft: ...Tch.@That, has nothing to do with Mii...!

group_1.textRight: Of course I understand that.
But there's still the public eye to look out for...@Some people can be, well, prejudiced.

group_1.textLeft: I just TOLD you!@This has nothing to do with Mii!
So what if Mii is a Daito girl?!
We didn't do anything here...
Why are we being suspected of things?!

group_1.textRight: Fu, fumufun...
...Geeze, kids these days. I just wanted to have a@little talk, and now look...
...What, why are you giving me that look?
You weren't actually attempting to shoplift,@were you?

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you still going on about that...?

group_1.textRight: Let me tell you from an adult's point of view, okay.
Your conduct doesn't seem all that good.
Just the other day, you were covered in makeup@and staying up late playing, weren't you...?
You two are still in elementary school.
Just keep in mind what's appropriate for kids like@you to be doing, alright?

group_1.textLeft: Mii is...Mii is...!

group_1.textCenter: Ohh...?@Mii, did you make a new friend?

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?
Sis...@Why, are you here...

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*...I also wanted to eat some Woohoodles.
Also, um...@Who might this be?
Ah, uhh...@I'm a part of the neighborhood watch...

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, thank you for your work~
So, what did you need with my little sister?

group_1.textRight: Oh, nothing. These two just seemed like they@might've been up to something, so...
I just had to give them a talking to.

group_1.textLeft: We WEREN'T up to anything! We were just looking@into the candy store!

group_1.textRight: Fumumun!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*...These girls really are just big fans of the@store, so don't worry.
They're familiar with the Grandma who runs the@store, too...
...so I don't think you need to worry yourself over@them?

group_1.textRight: But... I'm sure you're aware, right?
Recently things have improved around here...
But because you're from Daito...
...there's still lots of people suspicious of you.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* We'll be okay.
If we have such a good neighborhood watch like@gramps here...
Then security here will only improve.
Right?

group_1.textRight: Ahh...that...@what I meant was...
Well anyway, elementary school kids should be@getting home before it's dark.

group_1.textLeft: I'm their guardian. Don't you worry~
Mii and Sudachi, let's head home, okaay.
'Kaaay.

group_1.textRight: Uhh...we, well then, with that I'll be...

group_1.textLeft: ...Sis.

group_1.textRight: What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: ...Mii isn't bad. Mii didn't do anything wrong.

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* I know that.

group_1.textLeft: That guy just came up to us and started acting like@we were bad...

group_1.textRight: Did he? I'm sorry you had to put up with that...

group_1.textLeft: Heey.
How can Sis have such a calm look right now?
